metadata.Title: CVE-2011-2907 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Terascale Open-Source Resource and Queue Manager (aka TORQUE Resource Manager) 3.0.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to bypass host-based authentication and submit arbitrary jobs via a modified PBS_O_HOST variable to the qsub program.

notes.Note: ebarretto> Closing this as: Not fixable, would need an update to a release with MUNGE support, clusters typically run in locked down environments

criterions.comment: torque: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
